Public Member Functions | List of all members
DD::Image::Concurrency::WriteGuard Class Reference

Public Member Functions

 WriteGuard (Concurrency::ReadWriteLock &rwLock)
 

Detailed Description

Guard that performs a write lock on ctor and unlock on dtor. Use for scoping a write lock to get automatic unlocking.
